snippet: Usain Bolt, the world-record holder in the 100 meters, followed up his poor showing in the Czech Republic last week with a season’s-best 9.76 seconds at the Golden Gala on Thursday in Rome.
abstract: Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt wins 100-meter race at Golden Gala in 9.76 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt, the world-record holder in the 100 meters, followed up his poor showing in the Czech Republic last week with a season’s-best 9.76 seconds at the Golden Gala on Thursday in Rome.

headline.seo: Bolt Rebounds With Season’s Best in 100
headline.main: Bolt Rebounds With Season’s Best in 100
headline.print_headline: Bolt Bounces Back With Season’s Best in 100
